settings.point1_description: Brew and steam at the same time and enjoy café-quality drinks in minutes.
settings.point2_description: Dual built-in scales powered by Espresso OS, no scooping and no guessing.
settings.point3_description: Takes the guesswork out of new beans and delivers the right grind and brew instantly.

settings.title:
Streamlined Workflow
On Screen
settings.description: Start-to-finish coffee experience, with Meraki delivering a seamless workflow in every cup.

settings.title: Café Performance, At Home
settings.description: Enjoy your daily coffee ritual elevated, with café-quality espresso and creamy milk made easy.

settings.text: "This is a real game-changer! And to be honest, it completely blew our minds the first time we tried it, because the espresso was just so on point."
"It rivaled the much more expensive machines I was used to working with at my coffee jobs, creating a nice layer of crema and extracting the floral notes of the coffee."
"This linear approach optimizes and simplifies your coffee-making 'workflow' while still preserving the artistry and authenticity of barista-crafted espresso."

settings.heading: Stay Inspired with Meraki
settings.feature1_text: Join Meraki and enjoy exclusive offers and promotions.
settings.feature2_text: Get VIP support from your dedicated concierge.
settings.feature3_text: Access personalized tutorials tailored to your coffee journey.

settings.title: 1. Quick Request
settings.description: Click "Service Request" on our website and fill out the form to initiate your service request.

settings.title: 2. Timely Response
settings.description: Our customer service team will contact you within 48 business hours on working days (GMT+8, 10:00–18:00) to confirm your request and guide you through the next steps.

settings.title: 3. Flexible Solutions
settings.description:
You can choose:
— Spare parts delivery for easy DIY repair;
— Return & repair
Once your machine arrives, we will promptly handle the repair within 7–10 business days. We will stay in touch to ensure it is returned to you

settings.title: 4. Ongoing Support
settings.description: If you have any questions or feedback after the service, please don't hesitate to reach out. We're always here to support you and continuously improve your experience.
